    • getTaskDetails

      String getTaskDetails()

    • getAssignedDate

      LocalDate getAssignedDate()
      Returns the date that the task was assigned to the user
      Returns:
      A LocalDate formatted version of the task's assigned date

    • getDueDate

      LocalDate getDueDate()
      Returns the date that the task is due to be completed
      Returns:
      A LocalDate formatted version of the task's due date

    • getId

      int getId()
      Returns the unique ID of the task
      Returns:
      An integer of the task's ID

    • setId

      void setId(int taskId)
      Sets the task's unique id
      Parameters:
      taskId - The value of the task's id

    • getCategory

      taskCategory getCategory()
      Returns the category of the task that details how often it must be completed
      Returns:
      A taskCategory enum of the task's repetition category

    • setCategory

      void setCategory(taskCategory category)
      Sets the category of the task
      Parameters:
      category - The category of the task

    • updateTask

      void updateTask(Task newTask)
      Updates the currents tasks parameters
      Parameters:
      newTask - A task object that holds all the new parameters for the current task object
